name: market for biowaste, kitchen and garden waste | biowaste, kitchen and garden waste | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20306/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'biowaste, kitchen and garden waste', in the Global geography.;This market is delivering biowaste, kitchen and garden waste to the treatment that is following in their supply chain, namely a home composting process. The market cosniders no transportation as the waste generation and the treatment, both taking place in the same residential facility.

Activity starts with the generation of the waste in a residential facility.

Activity ends with the delivery of the biowaste, kitchen and garden waste to the home composter, in the same residential facility.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
